shrimp.name: Minnaert
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Minnaert limb darkening term. Integrate this diffuse term in your network, with ambient and specular terms, where required, if required. Cs or Os aren't taken into consideration here. Make proper arrangements in your shading network to include them where necessary. Note that darkening range values should be in the 1.0-2.0 range.
